fields.name: Likes
fields.value: Rust, Pixel Art and other visual arts, Minecraft (modded tech and building stuff) and many other videogames, cooking, tekno music (acid, tribe, ...), hardmusic (frenchcore, uptempo, rawstyle, ...)
